704645f-a.title: Brooklyn: Gold Street - Johnson Street
704645f-a.text:
325 Gold Street, east side, at the S.E. corner of Johnson Street, across from Flatbush Ave., Extension. The view shows building occupied by the Standard Union, now merged with the Brcoklyn Times Union.
December 10, 1939.
P. L. Sperr.
704645f-a.folder: Gold Street & Johnson Street, Brooklyn, NY

704646f-a.title: Brooklyn: Gold Street - Johnson Street
704646f-a.text:
Gold Street, east side, north from Johnson Street.
October 31, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
704646f-a.folder: Gold Street & Johnson Street, Brooklyn, NY

from Flatbush Ave., Extension.
